mapper.select: SELECT te.account AS investMoney, te.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, te.create_time AS investTime, te.user_id as userId, te.nid as orderId, CASE WHEN bn.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(bn.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(bn.borrow_period, '个月') END AS productStyle FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender te LEFT JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow bn ON te.borrow_nid = bn.borrow_nid WHERE te.nid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and te.user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT te.account AS investMoney, te.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, br.create_time AS investTime, te.user_id as userId, te.nid as orderId, CASE WHEN bn.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(bn.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(bn.borrow_period, '个月') END AS productStyle FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender te LEFT JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_recover br ON br.borrow_nid = te.borrow_nid AND br.nid = te.nid LEFT JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow bn ON te.borrow_nid = bn.borrow_nid WHERE te.nid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and te.user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT hdpa.accede_account AS investMoney, hdpa.plan_nid as borrowNid, hdpa.user_id as userId, hdpa.accede_order_id as orderId, CASE WHEN hdp.is_month = '0' THEN CONCAT(hdpa.lock_period, '天') WHEN hdp.is_month = '1' THEN CONCAT(hdpa.lock_period, '个月') END AS productStyle, hdpa.create_time AS investTime FROM hyjf_trade.ht_hjh_accede hdpa LEFT JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_hjh_plan hdp ON hdpa.plan_nid = hdp.plan_nid WHERE hdpa.user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hdpa.accede_order_id = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
